title: ProtonMail is working on a desktop mail client and rewritten mobile apps
content:
ProtonMail is a popular encrypted email service, made by the same folks as ProtonVPN. It’s one of the best options for sending secure messages over the internet, but the applications for accessing your ProtonMail inbox have never ben amazing. Thankfully, the developers have a plan to fix that. ProtonMail currently has a web client, a

The post ProtonMail is working on a desktop mail client and rewritten mobile apps appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Encrypted email service ProtonMail is working on updated Android and iOS apps and an experimental desktop mail client.
